pli-tv-bu-vb-sk44:1.3: According to [Sp.2.620]() this means repeatedly lifting a mouthful. Since the following rule refers to breaking pieces off a ball of food, this rule may refer to biting repeatedly into the same ball of food.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk44:1.7: _Khajjaka_. According to [Sp.2.615]() this refers to all non-staple foods: _Ettha mūlakhādanīyādi sabbaṃ gahetabbaṃ_, “Here the non-staple foods which are roots, etc. may all be taken.” | _Phalāphale_. See the PTS’ Pali English Dictionary, s.v. _ā_<sup>4</sup>.
